div.pre: 74 Mageira, Elis, 1950 Burial: c. 330-325 B.C. Contents: 48 AR Philip II: 4 lifetime tetradr. (Pella 1, Amphipolis 3) Alexander III: 1 lifetime tetradr. (Tarsus) Larissa, Thessaly: 1 dr. Phocis: 1 triob. Boeotia: 3 triob. Tanagra: 1 st. Thebes: 6 st.; 2 dr. Aegina: 24 st.; 2 dr. Elis: 3 st. Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1951, p. 104. (where slightly different totals are given)
